title: Face Recognition Attendance System
description: Web-based attendance system using facial recognition with Laravel, FastAPI, and vector databases for real-time tracking.

title: Trip Planner App
description: Its a trip planning mobile application that helps users to plan their trips efficiently by providing recommendations for destinations, accommodations, and activities based on user preferences.

title: Api Craft
description: Its a backend development framework for Nodejs + MongoDB to build scalable and maintainable APIs quickly with built-in features like authentication, validation, and error handling.

title: Zen Framework
description: Zen is a PHP Framework for develop APIs and Web Applications.
